categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the New Jedi Order

nodes.text: Hes Jor-Sharu was originally going to appear in Star Wars Battlefront: Renegade Squadron as the Jedi Knight who discovered evidence of Phantom Squadron in the Jedi Archives of Coruscant. He would later track down Col Serra, who was the commander of Renegade Squadron and ask what Phantom Squadron was, and Col would go on to tell him about Renegade Squadron's different exploits, including the Evacuation of Yavin. For some reason, Jor-Sharu was replaced by the female Jedi Master Tionne Solusar, and Phantom Squadron's name was changed to Renegade Squadron.
